summary.title: Bedrohungsmodell - OTT Auth
summary.description: Die Firma Allsecure betreibt unterschiedliche Anwendungen mit Hilfe einer 2-Faktorauthentifizierung via One-time token, der an das entsprechende Smartphone des Nutzers geschickt wird.

data.name:
Login System -
Webapp +
Mobile App
data.description: Vergleicht eingegebenen OTT-Wert auf Telefon mit erwartetem OTT seitens 2-Faktor-Dienst.

threats.title: DDoS
threats.description:
Ein DDoS Angriff kann den Login-Dienst überlasten und somit für Anwender unerreichbar machen. 

CAPEC-125: Flooding: An adversary consumes the resources of a target by rapidly engaging in a large number of interactions with the target.

ATT&CK: TA0038 - Network Effects: The adversary is trying to intercept or manipulate network traffic to or from a device.

D: 8 / R: 10 / E: 8 / A: 10 / DREA: 36
threats.mitigation:
Firewall, Load-Balancer oder CDN einsetzen, um direkten Datenverkehr auf Login-Server zu begrenzen.

DEFEND: D3-ITF - Inbound Traffic Filtering
ASVS: CWE 770 (8.1.4): Verify the application can detect and alert on abnormal numbers of requests, such as by IP, user, total per hour or day, or whatever makes sense for the application.

D: 4 / R: 10 / E: 4 / A: 10 / Neuer DREA: 28

threats.title: SD-Karte auslesen
threats.description:
Ein Angreifer verschafft sich physischen Zugriff auf das Gerät des Nutzers und liest die SD-Karte aus.

CAPEC-545: Pull Data from System Resources - An adversary who is authorized or has the ability to search known system resources, does so with the intention of gathering useful information. System resources include files, memory, and other aspects of the target system.

ATT&CK: T1005 - Data from Local System: Adversaries may search local system sources, such as file systems, configuration files, local databases, virtual machine files, or process memory, to find files of interest and sensitive data.

D: 8 / R: 2 / E: 10 / A: 1 / DREA: 21
threats.mitigation:
Datensparsamkeit, nur notwendigste Daten auf Clients zwischenspeichern und diese ausschließlich verschlüsselt ablegen.

OWASP ASVS 11.7.2: Verify that data minimization ensures the minimal amount of data is
exposed during processing, and ensure that data is encrypted immediately

D: 1 / R: 2 / E: 1 / A: 1 / DREA: 5

threats.title: Session übernehmen
threats.description:
Ein Angreifer kann die Session eines Anwenders übernehmen und sich so erweiterte Befugnisse verschaffen.

CAPEC-593: Session Hijacking - The adversary is able to steal or manipulate an active session and use it to gain unathorized access to the application.

ATT&CK: T1563 Remote Service Session Hijacking - Adversaries may take control of preexisting sessions with remote services to move laterally in an environment.

D: 10 / R: 7 / E: 10 / A: 10 / DREA: 32
threats.mitigation:
Sessiondauer reduzieren, Sessions absichern, jedes Mal neues OTT anfordern

D3FEND: D3-WSAM - Web Session Access Mediation: Web session access mediation secures user sessions in web applications by employing robust authentication and integrity validation, along with adaptive threat mitigation techniques, to ensure that access to web resources is authorized and protected from session-related attacks.

D: 2 / R: 2 / E: 3 / A: 10 / DREA: 17

threats.title: Manipuliertes Logging der Logins
threats.description:
Ein Angreifer manipuliert das Logging, wodurch eine korrekte Zuordnung des Logins nicht mehr möglich ist.

CAPEC-93: Log Injection-Tampering-Forging - The attacker injects, manipulates or forges malicious log entries in the log file, allowing them to mislead a log audit, cover traces of attack, or perform other malicious actions. The target host is not properly controlling log access. As a result tainted data is resulting in the log files leading to a failure in accountability, non-repudiation and incident forensics capability.

ATT&CK: T1562.003 - Impair Defenses: Impair Command History Logging: Adversaries may impair command history logging to hide commands they run on a compromised system.

D: 2 / R: 10 / E: 5 / A: 10 / DREA: 27
threats.mitigation:
Logging auf append-only setzen, Rechteverwaltung einführen und fälschungssichere Hash-Werte verwenden.

OWASP ASVS 16.4.2: Verify that logs are protected from unauthorized access and cannot be
modified.

D: 0 / R: 0 / E: 0 / A: 10 / DREA: 10

threats.title: DoS-Angriff und 2-Faktor-Authentifizierungsdienst
threats.description:
Die Verfügbarkeit des 2-Faktor-Authentifizierungsdienst wird durch eine Flut von Anfragen eingeschränkt.

CAPEC-488: HTTP Flood - An adversary may execute a flooding attack using the HTTP protocol with the intent to deny legitimate users access to a service by consuming resources at the application layer such as web services and their infrastructure. These attacks use legitimate session-based HTTP GET requests designed to consume large amounts of a server's resources. Since these are legitimate sessions this attack is very difficult to detect.

ATT&CK: T1499.003 - Endpoint Denial of Service: Application Exhaustion Flood - Adversaries may target resource intensive features of applications to cause a denial of service (DoS), denying availability to those applications.

D: 7 / R: 8 / E: 3 / A: 10 / DREA: 28
threats.mitigation:
Redundante Authentifizierungsserver, Load Balancer vorschalten, Traffic analysieren und blockieren

D3-ANAA: Administrative Network Activity Analysis - Detection of unauthorized use of administrative network protocols by analyzing network activity against a baseline.

D: 2 / R: 3 / E: 1 / A: 10 / DREA: 16

data.name:
Externer Service für T
elefonnummernauflö
sung

Allsecure
Mobile Phone
OTT Service
data.description: Bietet Dienste für den OTT Service der Firma Allsecure an

threats.title: Anwender per SIM-Swap impersonaten
threats.description:
Ein Angreifer kann die SIM-Karte des Anwenders per SIM-Swap übernehmen und sich somit als der Anwender ausgeben.

CAPEC-151: Identity Spoofing - An adversary may craft messages that appear to come from a different principle or use stolen / spoofed authentication credentials.

ATT&CK: T1451 - SIM Card Swap: Adversaries may gain access to mobile devices through transfers or swaps from victims’ phone numbers to adversary-controlled SIM cards and mobile devices.

D: 9 / R: 5 / E: 8 / A: 1 / DREA: 23
threats.mitigation:
SMS als Faktor verbieten und OTP (One Time Password) verwenden.

D3FEND: D3-CH - Credential Hardening: One-time password.

D: 4 / R: 5 / E: 4 / A: 1 / Neuer DREA: 14

data.name: SIEM
data.description: Überwacht 2-Faktor-Authentifizierungsdienst und Allsecure Mobile Phone OTT Service

threats.title: Protokollierte Events des SIEM manipulieren
threats.description:
Ein Angreifer sendet manipulierte Inputs, welche zu Fehlern im Protokollieren der Events durch das SIEM führen, wodurch der eigentliche Angriff verschleiert werden kann.

CAPEC-268: Audit Log Manipulation - The attacker injects, manipulates, deletes, or forges malicious log entries into the log file, in an attempt to mislead an audit of the log file or cover tracks of an attack.

ATT&CK: TA0005 - Defense Evasion: The adversary is trying to avoid being detected.

D: 0 / R: 10 / E: 5 / A: 10 / DREA: 25
threats.mitigation:
Input Validation einführen und Umgehungsversuche protokollieren.

OWASP ASVS 16.3.3: Verify that the application logs the security events that are defined in the
documentation and also logs attempts to bypass the security controls, such
as input validation, business logic, and anti‑automation.

D: 0 / R: 5 / E: 3 / A: 10 / DREA: 18
